name: Clin N Anus
title: Clinical N
notes: **Note:**  Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS, in this field.  Distant nodes are coded in metastasis.
rows: Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed

Clinical evaluation but unknown results or regional lymph node involvement not stated
Clinical evaluation done but results not documented in patient record

Unilateral or bilateral:
    Anorectal
    Inferior hemorrhoidal
    Lateral sacral (laterosacral)
    Perirectal
   
Regional lymph node(s), NOS
Lymph nodes, NOS

Stated as N1

Metastasis in unilateral internal iliac AND/OR
Unilateral inguinal lymph node(s)

Unilateral:
       Internal iliac (hypogastric)
       Obturator
       Superficial inguinal (femoral)

Stated as N2

Metastasis in perirectal and inguinal lymph nodes AND/OR
Bilateral internal iliac AND/OR
Bilateral inguinal lymph nodes

Bilateral:
      Internal iliac (hypogastric)
      Obturator
     Superficial inguinal (femoral)

Stated as N3
Clinical N is not defined for the specific site/histology

No clinical evaluation of regional lymph nodes
Cancer first detected on surgical resection
Unknown if any clinical assessment performed
